title: Can you please spam this with replies?  10-15 should do it.
body:
Yes I'm serious.  I have this weird bug where I can't go to the "my updates" page unless I have around 25-30 "unread" replies.

I've tried to get this fixed, but nothing works, it just redirects me to the boards home page.  Currently with all these hot topics it's hard to find individual replies to me without the my-updates page, so please help me out.  You can even downvote me if you want, idc.
